subject: Aborigines
Basketball
Indigenous People
lead_paragraph: Patty Mills of the San Antonio Spurs flies three flags: of Australia, the Aboriginals and the Torres Strait Islands, and like many Australians he continues to wrestle with complex questions of culture and heritage.
snippet: Patty Mills of the San Antonio Spurs flies three flags: of Australia, the Aboriginals and the Torres Strait Islands, and like many Australians he continues to wrestle with complex questions of culture and heritage.
